head.title: Travel Insurance
head.description: We believe that you should always have fond memories of your holidays. The cancellation insurance is already included in your booking price.

content.text:
We believe that you should always have fond memories of your holidays. That’s why we offer you ERV cancellation insurance. You may also choose an optional upgrade of your insurance cover with ERV travel cover.

Your cover before travelling: ERV cancellation insurance

Cancellation insurance is already included in your booking price. The deductible for each claim amounts to 20% of the reimbursable loss. You can find further details in the terms and conditions of ERV cancellation insurance.

Your cover when travelling: ERV travel insurance

Get the most out of your insurance cover:

  • Reimbursement of unused travel services and additional return travel costs if cancelled
  • Reimbursement for medical treatment worldwide
  • Reimbursement of search, rescue and recovery costs
  • Organization and reimbursement of ambulance and luggage transport
  • Luggage insurance

    

Premium per reservation: EUR 35,-

We recommend that you also consider the ERV travel insurance, in order to benefit from additional cover and services. You can find further details in the terms and conditions of ERV travel insurance.

Booking

ERV cancellation insurance is already included in your booking price. ERV travel insurance can be added to your accommodation booking directly during the booking process. If you have already booked your holiday you can book ERV travel insurance subsequently up until your day of arrival by calling our hotline on 0840 84 88 88. 

Claim documents 

In the case of loss a claim can be made by filling out the corresponding form:

  • Medical and hospital costs ILLNESS
  • Medical and hospital costs ACCIDENT
  • Luggage – theft / robbery / miscarriage
  • SOS protection for travel incidents
  • Cancellation costs

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Only selected and tested accommodation
elements.subtitle: Quality is our number one priority
elements.caption: Every property is checked before your arrival to ensure the best possible stay.

elements.title: Guaranteed availability and on-site service
elements.subtitle: Make the most of our experience
elements.caption: Key collection is arranged by our helpful staff.  Available 24/7 or on-site service to help you with all your questions, e.g.: tips and insights for your holiday destination and your booked accommodation.

elements.title: A memorable holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why Interhome
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, feel the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or the Spanish way of life. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online - quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
